Articles.Content:
Here's some screenshots of my first successful 3-man MÃƒÂ¼n landing. Thanks Squad for making this great game!

http://imgur.com/a/MTlxn
Nice! And I might just steal your lander stage for Duna

You might need to add some saddle tanks. The legs and big tank are left behind, but I can't imagine there being enough fuel left in the two engine mounted tanks for a return journey. You could put a parachute over each engine, though. That might help save fuel during the Duna landing. Let me know how things go. I still haven't managed to get past the Mun.
